website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive replacement leash compatible with name-brand soft tops.
pros: A budget but solid choice for foamies
Perfect length for Wavestorm and BIC boards
cons: No swivels or rail saver means leash can tangle up

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about this product for a while because it's pretty cheap compared to other leashes, but I can't tell a difference from other leashes 3x the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: In just my first wipeout the fabric cord that connects to the ankle broke, and the other ending cord that connects to the board is about to break too, in just one wipeout in a medium size wave using a wavestorm! And this is not just me that got a faulty piece, no, you look at the quality of the fabric cord and instantly realize it's garbage. Avoid, avoid!
customer_reviews.author: R2

customer_reviews.title: Great look/feel, terrible durability.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this leash as a step-up to the stock leash on my Wavestorm funboard. My initial impression was great - the leash is very comfortable on the ankle, looks great, and feels secure when riding. However, after using for approximately 10 sessions, the leash snapped on a small wave (i.e. minimal force). The puzzling aspect is that it snapped in the middle of the leash which is presumably the strongest part of a leash. You definitely get what you pay for at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Standard Leash & Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I got a used surfboard recently & wanted a new leash. This is pretty basic but works fine. I've got 2 try it out in the wavepool a couple times. I get it tangled around my legs quite often while walking & swimming but it hasn't seemed 2 affect riding the board yet. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best replacement leash for your softop
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love Wavestorms for anything under 3’ Hawaiian, they have the worst leashes ever and they always end up snapping or the Velcro stops sticking and leaves me swimming in and picking up my board from the reef. This leash is a great replacement. Velcro sticks way better than the regular leash and I already ordered another one for back up. The real test will be after I’ve used it for a while but as of now, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: rheif callahan

customer_reviews.title: Do not take out on days where the surf is head high or higher, it will snap and you will swim.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the easy installation and the comfort that the leash provided. However, the leash quit fairly quickly in larger surf. With the south swells picking up in Hawaii this July, I managed to have two of these leashes snap, resulting in me going for a long swim. I would recommend using this leash for smaller days, but would be very cautious going out with this leash into wave heights that are above hip or chest high.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great and reasonably priced purchase for my surf repetorie
customer_reviews.text: Bought this leash to fit on my new surfboard. After a couple weeks surfing without the leash, this leash has made all the difference in my surfing abilities. The leash is long enough, the cuff stays attached securely, and the design of the cuff allows the leash to move around without impact the surfer too much. As long as you don't dry out the leash while it is wrapped tightly around the board, the leash does not tangle in the water. This has been a great and reasonably priced purchase for my surf repetorie.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wavestorm surfboard and it was extremely easy to attach and use! The leash stays on well and isn’t painful like some other leashes I have tried in the past. The length also makes it more convenient when carrying around in the water and on land. I would highly recommend if you need to replace your leash.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars if it had a swivel
customer_reviews.text: Leash I was replacing had a swivel on the end near the board. Didn’t realize how useful that was until I went surfing with this leash and found my legs wrapped in the twisted leash multiple times. That is my only complaint, good quality cord, strong Velcro, and comfortable ankle cuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great leash, held well though all my flailing in some white water pummeling. I need lessons
customer_reviews.author: M DeYoung

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: There is a a big knot in it near where it attaches to the board. I busted my knee on this on a failed popup when it got caught between me and the board. Not the best design. I'm kind of scared to go out with it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mac

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have the rigid plastic on the cuff so it’s constantly getting tangled on my leg. There’s better options out there, Skip this one!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: ... used the leash yet but it appears to be good quality. I believe it will meet my needs ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the leash yet but it appears to be good quality. I believe it will meet my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Pooh

customer_reviews.title: He has used it and said it is perfect for his 6' board
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson. He has used it and said it is perfect for his 6' board.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works on my soft top SUP
customer_reviews.text: Using this on a paddle board. It works great to pull it up onto the dock or just keep it tied to the dock when you’re not ready to get it out of the water yet.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We have used this heavily for about 6 weeks and it still looks brand new. It’s a great length, comfortable to wear and a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my kids surfboards and they work perfectly for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Prime

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ankle strap!
customer_reviews.text: the leash was easy to install and very comfortable around the ankle
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Whapash!
customer_reviews.text: Stoked on how cheap this was and how fast it was delivered. Works just like any other leash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it I promise it’s not a low quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product is higher quality than it is worth! seriously very happy with my purchase. Works out for me perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Raphael P.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the leash for my 12 year old who is learning to surf. He loves it. The cuff is soft and the leash length works really well. Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The leash broke in less than a year of use. You get what you pay for. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Perez-Mena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but it appears to be identical to the original leash.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M.

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for this price
customer_reviews.text: Great leash! I wasn't expecting much for this price but it is definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Trd

customer_reviews.title: Great price for surfboard replacement leash.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect replacement leash for my son's surfboard. Great price and fast shipping! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the original one that came attached to the paddleboard.
customer_reviews.author: lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash. Super comfortable and there were moments in ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome leash. Super comfortable and there were moments in the water where I didn't even feel like I had a leash on. No complaints, buy this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not a name brand and it shows,good for kids learning on sift tops
customer_reviews.text: Good leash for price but needs a swivel to help with kinking up
customer_reviews.author: Keith Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the surfboard or my sons boogy board. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The leash is great. It saved my board from floating away a ...
customer_reviews.text: The leash is great. It saved my board from floating away a few times. Won't come off your foot EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Haitoff

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it yet but it met my expectations ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but it met my expectations completely.I plan on using with an inflatable Kayak while paddling along the beach in Destin FL.
customer_reviews.author: Astec Scott

product_meta.title: Santa Barbara Surfing SBS - 8ft Soft Top Leash - 8' Replacement Leash for Wavestorm and Other SoftTop Surfboards
product_meta.description: We've been there. An epic day at the beach with the family. Waves are ridden, watermelon is eaten. You arrive home at the end of the day, try to clean up all your gear, and realize the leash to your Wavestorm is nowhere to be found. Do not fear: Click BUY NOW and you've got the SBS 8' Softtop leash dispatched to you ASAP so you'll have it for your next epic beach day.
feature_bullets: EXACT REPLACEMENT: We made sure our soft top replacement leash is just like the original leash on your Wavestorm surfboard.
PERFECT LENGTH: The SBS 8ft soft top leash is the same length has most softops such as wave storm and BIC, which is the length you want.
EASY INSTALLATION: Just loop it through the existing leash tie and you are good to go.
EASY ON THE BUDGET: We put in the things you need on this leash but left out the bells and whistles, so it's easy on the family budget.

GUARANTEED FOR LIFE: Founded in 1999, Santa Barbara Surfing is a brand you can count on. We stand behind each item we sell and take pride in our over the top customer support. Something goes wrong? Get a replacement!
